errors.empty-child: The value of the Child's Key property cannot be empty
errors.empty-path: The value of the Path property cannot be empty
errors.invalid-bool: The value of the defined property is not a valid boolean
errors.invalid-bool-prop: __prop__: The value of the __prop__ property defined is not a valid boolean
errors.invalid-child: The Child's Key property value cannot contain the following characters: '.', '#', '$', '[', ']' or ' '
errors.invalid-num: The value of the defined property is not a valid number
errors.invalid-num-prop: __prop__: The value of the __prop__ property defined is not a valid number
errors.invalid-path: The Path property value cannot contain the following characters: '.', '#', '$', '[', ']' or ' '
errors.invalid-range: The value of the defined property is not in a valid range
errors.invalid-range-prop: __prop__: The value of the __prop__ property defined is not in a valid range
errors.invalid-type: The selected type is not or no longer valid, please select a valid type
errors.invalid-type-prop: __prop__: The type of property __prop__ is not or no longer valid, please select a valid type
errors.multiple-limit: Only one constraint of type 'Limit to...' is allowed
errors.multiple-order: Only one constraint of type 'Order by...' is allowed
errors.no-integer: The value of the defined property must be an integer
errors.no-integer-prop: __prop__: The value of the defined __prop__ property must be an integer
errors.no-object: The value of the defined property must be an object
errors.type-in-use: This type of constraint is already used
